Articles.Content: so i was bored booted up my old laptop which still runs xp for about half an hour i played pinball with debug mode on. then i realized that xp has some really cool themes. if you still run xp there's a screen saver that comes with the os and its an astronought in Eva around a space station orbiting the earth you should try it out because it is really cool especially with the high def graphics ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

XP 'aint that old ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

Ever played [Hover!](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hover!)? it comes with Windows '95 ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Edit: well bugger me, there's a [WebGL version](http://hover.ie). Ahh the nostalgia.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-30T19:21:18Z" title="05/30/2015 07:21  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 30, 2015</time> by steve\_v**

my favorite thing about old games is there debug modes wich modern games dont have for some reason.

like ion microsoft pinbsl spce cadet just after starting the game if you type in hidden test and hit enter before the game starts you can control the ball with left clicking your mouse

> 
> so i was bored booted up my old laptop which still runs xp for about half an hour i played pinball with debug mode on. then i realized that xp has some really cool themes. if you still run xp there's a screen saver that comes with the os and its an astronought in Eva around a space station orbiting the earth you should try it out because it is really cool especially with the high def graphics ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

That must be something that is only packaged with your laptop. Might also be part of a software bundle for the GPU, because it certainly sounds like something designed to show off graphics power. 

I had standard WinXp Pro and have NEVER seen this screen saver.
i cant find it on the internet? what? well i will upload a potatoe cam video some time then sigh

The "Space" screensaver came with the [Plus pack add-on](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Microsoft_Plus!). Along with some very nice fish ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

I just realized - these days you'd call the Plus pack "DLC" - lol.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-30T21:29:35Z" title="05/30/2015 09:29  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 30, 2015</time> by basic.syntax**

[![flying_toasters.jpg](http://regmedia.co.uk/2014/03/17/flying_toasters.jpg)](http://bryanbraun.github.io/after-dark-css/all/flying-toasters.html)

This is what space really looks like ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
there it is dont you just love the graphics and how they orbit the earth in 90 seconds?
